snippet.title: Rough Justice: '84 - Reveal Trailer [EN]
snippet.description:
Rough Justice is a single-player, time management game, where you run a private security agency. Hire, manage, train, and deploy agents to fulfill a number of contracts from various clients; dealing with fugitive recovery, repossession, and private investigative tasks.

Wishlist Rough Justice on steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1291860/Rough_Justice_84/

Website: https://rough-justice.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RoughJusticeNow
Discord: https://discord.gg/roughjustice


Music by Raouf Rectobiasi  https://www.raouf-rectobiasi.com/
Trailer by Timo Krahl  http://silkrust.de/
